I'd highly recommend "Starter for 10" if you're interested in a first contact movie set within the context of a university environment. This film features an impressive cast including James McAvoy, Benedict Cumberbatch, and others, making it both entertaining and engaging!

If you're looking for something a bit different, "Before Sunset" is another captivating choice. In this film, Ethan Hawke and Julie Delpy reprise their roles from the 1995 classic "Before Sunrise," exploring themes of connection and communication as two strangers meet again years later. Enjoy!

I'd highly recommend "21 Jump Street" (2012) if you're in the mood for a lighthearted, action-comedy. Channing Tatum and Jonah Hill deliver hilarious performances as undercover cops trying to bring down a drug ring in high school.

If you prefer a more dramatic tale, "A Beautiful Mind" (2001) might be more appealing. This film follows the life of Nobel laureate John Nash, brilliantly portrayed by Russell Crowe, as he battles with schizophrenia and eventual recovery. Both movies are excellent choices, depending on your current mood!
